name: Chariot (itch) (Moonkey Lab)
description:
This is a small demo of the game.

You are a spirit relegated into a hand wich has the power to control some objects.

Use the mouse to move around. 

Right mouse button to control varius objects

Left mouse to make perform actions to objects 

Ball control the more distant is the Ball from the Hand it increases the power of the shoot with Left Mouse Button
